name: Comprehensive Content Suite
description: Complete content transformation with all formats including blog posts, social media, SEO optimization, and video descriptions.
prompt: Transform the following content into a comprehensive suite of marketing materials including blog posts, social media content, SEO tags, and video descriptions. Focus on maintaining brand voice while optimizing for different platforms and audiences.

name: YouTube Optimization
description: Specialized for YouTube content with descriptions, timestamps, tags, and engagement-focused copy.
prompt: Create YouTube-optimized content including compelling descriptions, video timestamps, relevant tags, and engagement hooks. Focus on discoverability and viewer retention.

name: Blog & SEO Focus
description: SEO-optimized blog posts with meta descriptions, headers, and keyword integration.
prompt: Transform this content into SEO-optimized blog posts with proper header structure, meta descriptions, keyword integration, and search-friendly formatting.

name: Social Media Pack
description: Multi-platform social media content for Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, and Instagram.
prompt: Create engaging social media content optimized for Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, and Instagram. Include hashtags, engagement hooks, and platform-specific formatting.

name: Technical Documentation
description: Developer and technical audience focused content with code examples and technical depth.
prompt: Transform this into technical documentation suitable for developers and technical audiences. Include code examples, technical specifications, and detailed explanations.

name: Marketing Campaign
description: Sales-focused content with compelling CTAs and conversion-optimized copy.
prompt: Create marketing campaign content with compelling calls-to-action, conversion-focused copy, and persuasive messaging that drives action.

name: Podcast Content
description: Podcast-specific content including show notes, episode descriptions, and audio-first formatting.
prompt: Transform this into podcast-ready content including detailed show notes, episode descriptions, guest introductions, and audio-first formatting.

name: E-commerce Product
description: Product descriptions, sales copy, and e-commerce focused content.
prompt: Create e-commerce optimized content including compelling product descriptions, sales copy, feature highlights, and conversion-focused messaging.

name: Email Newsletter
description: Newsletter content with subject lines, segments, and email-optimized formatting.
prompt: Transform this into email newsletter content with compelling subject lines, segmented sections, and email-optimized formatting that drives engagement.

name: Webinar Presentation
description: Webinar content with slides, talking points, and engagement elements.
prompt: Create webinar presentation content including slide outlines, talking points, audience engagement elements, and interactive components.

name: Corporate Communication
description: Professional corporate content for internal and external business communications.
prompt: Transform this into professional corporate communication suitable for business contexts, internal memos, and executive presentations.

name: Startup Pitch
description: Investor and startup-focused content with compelling narratives and growth metrics.
prompt: Create startup-focused content including investor pitches, growth narratives, market opportunity descriptions, and compelling business stories.

name: Healthcare Content
description: Medical and healthcare content with compliance considerations and patient education focus.
prompt: Transform this into healthcare-appropriate content with medical accuracy, compliance considerations, and patient education focus.

name: Financial Services
description: Finance and investment content with regulatory compliance and professional tone.
prompt: Create financial services content with regulatory compliance, professional tone, and investment-focused messaging appropriate for financial audiences.

name: Non-profit Impact
description: Mission-driven content for non-profits with impact stories and donation focus.
prompt: Transform this into non-profit content highlighting mission impact, success stories, and donation-focused messaging that inspires action.

name: Local Business
description: Community-focused content for local businesses with location-based optimization.
prompt: Create local business content with community focus, location-based optimization, and local customer engagement strategies.
